examples.korean: a moated manor house 발음듣기 해자를 두른 영주의 저택 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: an 18th century country mansion 발음듣기 18세기 때의 시골 대저택 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
